channel.title: Weps are too fast
channel.description: i want to slow down the weps they hit way too fast...im using devo7,also if you are hitting a npc and they hit you in the middle of a attack you just go back to standing. how do i fix that?

item.title: Weps are too fast
item.dc:creator: @Free Free
item.description:
@Free wrote:

Its an animation error. It has nothing to do with the speed of the attack. I honestly don’t know why you need this fixed. I also think this is a client error (?).

Read full topic
